The part of [[[SCP-2700|SCP-2700]]] where Nikolai Tesla is taken to the Traveller's home dimension after being recruited for the construction of the Teleforce. To quote the article itself where this scene takes place: "It was a world with a pulse, a life that I could palpate, and at that point I felt the enormity of my world's hollow and primitive nature collapse upon me. I cried, not at his world's beauty but at my world's sheer inferiority." 

I do highly recommend reading SCP-2700 for yourself. It's one of my favorite pieces on the site.
